mathfunctions module

Module to compute some mathematical calcul such as the euclidean distance between two customers, …

utils.mathfunctions.euclideanDistance()

Function to get the distance between 2 points

Parameters

  • a – First point

  • b – Second point

Returns

The distance between those 2 points

Return type

float

utils.mathfunctions.euclideanDistanceImplementation(a: problem.node.NodeWithCoord, b: problem.node.NodeWithCoord) → float

euclideanDistance()

Function to get the distance between 2 points

Parameters

  • a (NodeWithCoord) – First point

  • b (NodeWithCoord) – Second point

Returns

The distance between those 2 points

Return type

float

utils.mathfunctions.linearInterpolation()

Function to put a value between 0 and 1 given a max value, min value, and the value to situated

Parameters

  • min_value – minimum value of the list

  • max_value – maximum value of the list

  • value – value to place

Returns

A value between 0 and 1

Return type

float

utils.mathfunctions.linearInterpolationImplementation(min_value: float, max_value: float, value: float) → float

linearInterpolation()

Function to put a value between 0 and 1 given a max value, min value, and the value to situated

Parameters

  • min_value (float) – minimum value of the list

  • max_value (float) – maximum value of the list

  • value (float) – value to place

Returns

A value between 0 and 1

Return type

float
